DOC.brief_summary: The DuraGraft® Registry European registry patient undergone CABG whose vascular graft treat DuraGraft . All participate site country Europe . The DuraGraft Registry collect pre-CABG , intraoperative post-operative data , major post-CABG cardiovascular adverse event , health economic outcome patient report quality life period 5 year .
DOC.brief_title: EU Multicenter Registry Assess Outcomes CABG Patients : Treatment Vascular Conduits With DuraGraft VASC
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : ( ) To evaluate Safety Performance DuraGraft® ( ii ) To characterize use DuraGraft outcomes patient whose vascular graft treat DuraGraft daily clinical routine ( iii ) To characterize incidence MACCE outcomes associate CABG patient whose vascular graft treat DuraGraft daily clinical routine ( iv ) To compare use DuraGraft among hospital practice ( v ) To obtain patient report quality life information ( vi ) To obtain important health economics outcome
DOC.criteria: Patient undergo isolated CABG procedure CABG plus aortic mitral valve surgery least one saphenous vein radial artery graft Patient ≥18 year age Patient ( legally authorize representative ) willing able provide consent DuraGraft use CABG procedure Participation device study receive active drug product investigational study within one month prior enrollment
